name: Asante_kwa_kushiriki_pinion_matters_to_us
label: Thank you for taking part in this week's module. We hope you enjoyed it and that you feel that you have learned something. Please take a moment to fill out this survey to let us know how this session was for you. Your opinion matters to us!

name: select_one_group_name
label: A. Please select your group below:

name: intro
label: C. Please indicate how much you agree with the following statements:

name: select_one_interest
label: C1. I found the content presented interesting.

name: select_one_new_thing
label: C2. I learnt something new and interesting.

name: select_one_content_clear
label: C3. The app content was clear

name: select_one_positive_expe
label: C4. The session was a positive experience for me.

name: session_like
label: C5.What part of the session did you like the most and why?

name: sthnew_learn
label: C6. What is something new you learned?

name: activity_enjoy
label: C7. What activity did you not enjoy and why?

name: module_better
label: C8. Is there anything you feel we can do to make this module better for you and other caregivers?
